item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260116)
item.description:
What's New

feat: Implement AX-based matching for Window Title Rules

Add accessibility (AX) attribute matching to WindowTitleRule for context-aware detection:

New AX Matching Fields

  • axRolePattern: Match AX Role (AXTextArea, AXTextField, etc.)
  • axDescriptionPattern: Match AX Description
  • axIdentifierPattern: Match both AXIdentifier AND AXDOMIdentifier
  • axDOMClassList: Match if ANY class exists in AXDOMClassList

FocusedElementInfo Updates

  • Add domIdentifier field for AXDOMIdentifier attribute
  • Query AXDOMIdentifier in getFocusedElementInfo()

Firefox Address Bar Rules

  • Add built-in rule 'Firefox Address Bar (Selection)' - enabled by default
  • Add built-in rule 'Firefox Address Bar (AX Direct)' - disabled by default
  • Both match via axIdentifierPattern: 'urlbar-input'
  • Remove hard-coded Firefox address bar detection

Rule Matching Logic

  • Lazy-load AX info only when rule has AX patterns (performance optimization)
  • Fix built-in rules to respect isEnabled flag
  • axIdentifierPattern matches EITHER AXIdentifier OR AXDOMIdentifier

UI Updates (WindowTitleRulesView)

  • Add AX Matching groupbox with 4 input fields
  • Display 'ðŸŽ¯AX' badge for rules with AX patterns
  • Update loadExistingRule/saveRule/importRules for AX fields
  • Increase sheet size to 560x900
